text: aur qaum samood ki taraf un ke bhai saaleh ko bheja, us ne kaha aye meri qaum tum Allah ki ibadath karo us ke siva tumhara koi mabood nahi, osi ne tumhe zamin se paida kiya hai aur osi ne us zamin mein tumhe basaya hai, pus tum us se maafi talab karo aur us ki taraf rujo karo, beshak mera rub qareeb aur duaao ka qubol karne wala hai
